code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import dict from"./modules/dict";import{createBrowserHistory}from"history";export var history=createBrowserHistory();var middlewares=[thunk];var enhancer=applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares);var rootReducer=combineReducers({dict:dict});var store=createStore(rootReducer,enhancer);export default store;
